questions.question_stem: From a collection of nine paintings, four are to be selected to hang side-by-side on a gallery wall in positions 1, 2, 3 and 4. In how many ways can this be done?
questions.question_stem_html: From a collection of nine paintings, four are to be selected to hang side-by-side on a gallery wall in positions 1, 2, 3 and 4. In how many ways can this be done?
